Name: Joseph Amato
Comment: Yes but it's not a true shared library. For instance there is no version control. So if changes are made to a component on one project the same component on other projects is not updated.

Name: Pavel Kukla
Comment: You can create a private password protected page for each project and use it as a library for assets. Or even dedicate an entire project just for a collection of components. Copy+paste works across projects.
